concept.title: Client Platform Technical Preview
concept.shortdesc: Sametime offers previews of features in development that you can try out. These features may not be completely production-ready yet, so exercise discretion while using them.

conbody.p: Starting Sametime 12.0.1, Sametime is offering the Client Platform technical preview. The client platform provides convenient widgets for quick and easy Sametime integration as well as lower-level React-based components and JavaScript API functions.
